step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,[DebtorNr] ,[Name] ,do.docnumber AS SODescription ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,MAX(ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,EGPlannedDate,103),'')) AS [EGPlannedDate] ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [NewDeliveryDate] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr and r.regel = i.rownr and r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode LEFT JOIN [483]..orkrg io with (NOLOCK) on io.ordernr = RIGHT(i.SODescription, 8) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where i.state = 2 AND i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7') -- except 28,99 and 83 and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 AND io.ordernr is null GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,i.[DebtorNr] ,i.[Name] ,do.docnumber ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail) ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ORDER BY EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr
step.contentbody:
To: %Name% - %EmailAddress%

Dear Customer,

We want to inform you about an upcoming change in delivery times for your open orders. Based on the current situation/information in regards to the availability of the components we have rescheduled your orders, which you will see below.
If the situation changes again we will inform you accordingly.
Order numberYour ReferenceItemcode Your ItemcodeDescriptionQuantity New Ship Date
%OrderNr%%SODescription%%Itemcode%%ItemCodeAccount% %ItemDescription%%Quantity%%NewDeliveryDate%
 

Best regards,
Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailname=Stoneridge - Orlaco Global Support team;emailreplyto=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=m.velthoven@orlaco.com%semicolon%lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=TEST - New order confirmation - Changed delivery date;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=OrderNr,SODescription,Itemcode,ItemDescription,Quantity,NewDeliveryDate;mex_connectionid=0;emailsplitcolumn=EmailAddress;

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,[DebtorNr] ,[Name] ,do.docnumber AS SODescription ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,MAX(ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,EGPlannedDate,103),'')) AS [EGPlannedDate] ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [NewDeliveryDate] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail as AccountManager from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr and r.regel = i.rownr and r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode LEFT JOIN [483]..orkrg io with (NOLOCK) on io.ordernr = RIGHT(i.SODescription, 8) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where i.state = 2 AND i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7') -- except 28,99 and 83 and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 AND io.ordernr is null GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,i.[DebtorNr] ,i.[Name] ,do.docnumber ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail) ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail ORDER BY EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr

step.datasource: UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] SET EmailSent = 1, [EmailAddress] = LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))), sysmodified = GETDATE() from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join [400]..orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN [400]..orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = r.ordernr inner join [400]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join [400]..ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode LEFT JOIN [483]..orkrg io with (NOLOCK) on io.ordernr = RIGHT(i.SODescription, 8) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7','99') and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 AND io.ordernr is null

SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,[DebtorNr] ,[Name] ,do.docnumber AS SODescription ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,MAX(ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,EGPlannedDate,103),'')) AS [EGPlannedDate] ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [NewDeliveryDate] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr and r.regel = i.rownr and r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode where i.state = 2 AND i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7','83') -- except 28 and 99 and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,i.[DebtorNr] ,i.[Name] ,do.docnumber ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail) ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ORDER BY EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr

Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailname=Stoneridge - Orlaco Global Support team;emailreplyto=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=m.velthoven@orlaco.com%semicolon%lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=TEST - New order confirmation - Changed delivery date;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=OrderNr,SODescription,Itemcode,ItemDescription,Quantity,NewDeliveryDate;mex_connectionid=0;emailsplitcolumn=EmailAddress;

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,[DebtorNr] ,[Name] ,do.docnumber AS SODescription ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,MAX(ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,EGPlannedDate,103),'')) AS [EGPlannedDate] ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [NewDeliveryDate] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail as AccountManager from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr and r.regel = i.rownr and r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where i.state = 2 AND i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7') -- except 28 and 99 and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,i.[DebtorNr] ,i.[Name] ,do.docnumber ,i.[SODate] ,r.regel ,CASE WHEN r.afldat = '2099-12-31' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail) ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail ORDER BY EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr
step.contentbody:
To: %Name% - %EmailAddress%

Dear Customer,

We want to inform you about an upcoming change in delivery times for your open orders. Based on the current situation/information in regards to the availability of the components we have rescheduled your orders, which you will see below.
If the situation changes again we will inform you accordingly.
Order numberYour ReferenceItemcode Your ItemcodeDescriptionQuantity New Ship Date
%OrderNr%%SODescription%%Itemcode%%ItemCodeAccount% %ItemDescription%%Quantity%%NewDeliveryDate%
 

Best regards,
Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailname=Stoneridge - Orlaco Global Support team;emailreplyto=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=%EmailAddress%;emailcc=;emailbcc=support.netherlands@stoneridge.com%semicolon%lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com%semicolon%%AccountManager%;emailsub=New order confirmation - Changed delivery date;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=OrderNr,SODescription,Itemcode,ItemDescription,Quantity,NewDeliveryDate;mex_connectionid=0;emailsplitcolumn=EmailAddress;

step.datasource: UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] SET EmailSent = 1, [EmailAddress] = LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(EmailAddress,do.ord_contactemail)))), sysmodified = GETDATE() from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join [484]..orkrg do with (NOLOCK) on do.ordernr = i.ordernr INNER JOIN [484]..orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = r.ordernr inner join [484]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join [484]..ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode where i.SelectionCode IN ('1','2','5','7','99') and i.EmailSent = 0 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0
